display_long_description:
Welcome to Blade Impact, the ultimate VR sword-fighting experience where every swing counts and every mistake costs you the match.

Join our discord! https://discord.gg/pX5at22MxE


The new Arena Mode challenges you to survive against endless waves of increasingly skilled opponents. Each enemy fights with purpose—defending, countering, and maintaining distance like a real swordsman. You’ll have to rely on timing, precision, and genuine technique to win. There are no easy exploits here—cheap tricks won’t save you.

[media]

Unlike most physics-based sandboxes, Blade Impact focuses on delivering the feeling of real sword combat. Enemies protect themselves intelligently, react to your movements, and punish reckless attacks. You’ll need to aim precisely for valid target areas—head and torso—to land a clean hit and send your opponent flying.

[media]

For variety, the original Story Mode and Custom Match are still available—battle six distinct AI duelists or create your own perfect fight setup.

[media]

With sleek visuals, lightning-fast pacing, and zero downtime, Blade Impact delivers pure intensity and authentic sword-fighting action like nothing else in VR.
